attributes.action: force the growing of moustaches and wearing of hats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The higher levels of crime and break up of the social fabric in the UK has coincided with the drastic reduction of moustaches and hats on gentlemen. Surely the way forward is to enact a law enforcing these so that we can therefore go back to the gentle time that my grandad used to tell me about! Cardigans are to be considered during the passage of the Act through parliament

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
